title: CaReese Moments [Season 1 Part 1] Person of Interest
author: realproperaliens
comment: Thanks for putting this together, their chemistry was so very good to watch, I will miss her so much and something tells me so will Caviezel.
The way he looks at her in the first scene...instant chemistry.
This show is the best ! Period! No competition. Love the carter reese vid. You can tell something was there between them if you payed attention.
This video brought back so many  memories! Thank you :)
Careese Forever<333 These two will forever have a special place in my heart!
description:
Here is Part 1 of all the CaReese moments from season 1 of Person of Interest. This covers episodes 1-9, I included not only direct interaction with Carter and Reese but also scenes where they talk to other characters about each other. There were a couple of instances where Carter briefly mentions "The Man in the Suit", I did not put all of them in because they were only 1 or two seconds and very unimportant.

Part 2 of season 1 will be up soon, and season 2 should be up in a couple of weeks.

Enjoy!!!!
